pages.text: The $(item)Rotary Grinder$() works like a lot of well known machines: it crushes things. Most notably, it can crush an $(thing)Ore$() into 2 $(thing)Dusts$(), each being smeltable into an $(thing)Ingot$().$(br)It has a variety of other uses, and is required to progress through the mod.$(br2)Items can be inserted/extracted from any side except top and bottom.
